id.description: Unique identifier in whole Data Ecosystem. When not provided, Data Ecosystem will create and assign an id to the record. Must follow the naming convention: {Data-Partition-Id}:{object-type}:{uuid}.

kind.description: Record kind for which the schema information is applied to.

ids.description: List of record ids. Each record id must follow the naming convention {Data-Partition-Id}:{dataset-name}:{record-type}:{version}.

kind.description: Record kind for which the schema information is applied to.
